definitions.definition: Digitalis , a genus of about 20 species of herbaceous biennials native to the Old World , certain of which are prized for their showy flowers. The drug digitalis or digoxin was first isolated from the plant.

main_definition: Digitalis , a genus of about 20 species of herbaceous biennials native to the Old World , certain of which are prized for their showy flowers. The drug digitalis or digoxin was first isolated from the plant.
